label: TTParty
comment: An individual, group, or body related to a Track and Trace (TT) process.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying the type of TT party.
A code specifying the role of this TT party.
An identifier of the type for this TT party.

referencedBy.comment: A destination related party for this TT aggregation event.
The holder responsible party for this TT animal.
The receiving party specified for this TT exchanged document.
The sending party specified for this TT exchanged document.
A source related party for this TT aggregation event.
